USER QUERY: When motion triggers in the Family Room after sunset, turn the Hallway lights on immediately to 80% using the fastest ramp rate. Also, overnight (22:00–06:00) if I fast-on the Hallway control, set the Outside Deck Light to 60% with a moderate ramp. Every weekday during business hours (mon–fri 09:00–17:00), if there is no motion in the Family Room and the Hallway is responding, ensure both Hallway and Outside Deck are off.
